actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the River and Harbor Act of 1968 to authorize the Army Corps of Engineers to carry out non-structural projects to prevent or mitigate shore damages attributable to Federal navigation works.

summary.text: Amends the River and Harbor Act of 1968 to authorize the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out, at full Federal expense, nonstructural projects to prevent or mitigate shore damage attributable to Federal navigation works.

titles.title: A bill to amend the River and Harbor Act of 1968 to authorize the Army Corps of Engineers to carry out non-structural projects to prevent or mitigate shore damages attributable to Federal navigation works.
